001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.storage;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.DataExtractor;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.DataExtractorImpl;
005import io.restassured.response.Response;
006
007/**
008 * Provides utility methods for extracting data from API responses.
009 *
010 * <p>This class defines reusable {@link DataExtractor} implementations for extracting
011 * response body values and HTTP status codes.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015public class DataExtractorsApi {
016
017   private DataExtractorsApi() {
018   }
019
020   /**
021    * Creates a {@link DataExtractor} to extract a value from a response body using a JSON path.
022    *
023    * @param key      The storage key associated with the extraction.
024    * @param jsonPath The JSON path expression to locate the value in the response body.
025    * @param <T>      The type of the extracted data.
026    * @return A {@code DataExtractor} configured for response body extraction.
027    */
028   public static <T> DataExtractor<T> responseBodyExtraction(Enum<?> key, String jsonPath) {
029      return new DataExtractorImpl<>(
030            StorageKeysApi.API,
031            key,
032            raw -> {
033               Response response = (Response) raw;
034               return response.body().jsonPath().get(jsonPath);
035            }
036      );
037   }
038
039   /**
040    * Creates a {@link DataExtractor} to extract the HTTP status code from a response.
041    *
042    * @param key The storage key associated with the extraction.
043    * @return A {@code DataExtractor} configured for status code extraction.
044    */
045   public static DataExtractor<Integer> statusExtraction(Enum<?> key) {
046      return new DataExtractorImpl<>(
047            StorageKeysApi.API,
048            key,
049            raw -> {
050               Response response = (Response) raw;
051               return response.statusCode();
052            }
053      );
054   }
055
056}
